SatanParlor:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

SatanParlor:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
SatanParlor:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

SatanParlor:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.

SatanParlor:rage.NAME: Rage of Sparta
SatanParlor:rage.FLAVOR: Let the Rage of Sparta fuel your blade!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 2 strength for every blade of chaos in your deck.

SatanParlor:chalice.NAME: Hera's Chalice
SatanParlor:chalice.FLAVOR: Curse received from destroying Hera's Garden.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, lose 1 HP until you only have 1 left.

SatanParlor:amulet.NAME: Persephone's Amulet
SatanParlor:amulet.FLAVOR: Receive the blessing of the Underworld.

SatanParlor:minohorn.NAME: Minotaur Horn
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card of each combat is played twice
